author: cms-sw
body:
@Dr15Jones @makortel  , this change will replace `15_0_ROOT634_X` IBs with `15_0_RNTUPLE_X` IBs. Currently

- it uses separate cmsdist branch `IB/CMSSW_15_0_X/rntuple` which for now is identical to `IB/CMSSW_15_0_X/rootmatster`. As discussed ,  unlike `IB/CMSSW_15_0_X/rootmatster` which gets updated every week, `IB/CMSSW_15_0_X/rntuple`  will not be frequently updated.
- External changes from cmsdist default branch  (i.e. `IB/CMSSW_15_0_X/master`) will be automatically forward ported to `IB/CMSSW_15_0_X/rntuple`
- It uses cmssw `master` branch as base.
title: Replace 15.0 ROOT634 IBs with RNTUPLE
